abilities.name: Death Burst.
abilities.description: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of jagged ice. Each creature within 5 ft. of it must make a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, taking 4 (1d8) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

abilities.name: False Appearance.
abilities.description: While the mephit remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary shard of ice.

abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
abilities.description: The mephit can innately cast fog cloud, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.
